member.name: FaceRectInfo
member.summary: The FaceRectInfo structure describes the blob format for the MF_CAPTURE_METADATA_FACEROIS attribute.

member.name: FaceRectInfo.Region
member.summary: Relative coordinates on the frame that face detection is running (Q31 format).

member.name: FaceRectInfo.confidenceLevel
member.summary: Confidence level of the region being a face (0 - 100).
